PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-08592015-06-18FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActInsurance Companies Act
SubjectMutual Property and Casualty Insurance Company Having Only Mutual Policyholders Conversion Regulations
PrecisMUTUAL PROPERTY AND CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY HAVING ONLY MUTUAL POLICYHOLDERS CONVERSION REGULATIONS in order to provide federally regulated mutual property and casualty companies with the option to demutualize within a framework that ensures fair and equitable treatment of policyholders and establishes an orderly and transparent process for demutualizing.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0167 Publication Date: 2015-07-01
AttachmentsAttachment
